title: Actual Inductor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone each night to see if they win with the Mayor.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Roles that win with the Mayor win with the Mayor. Roles that don't win with the Mayor don't win with the Mayor. This only accounts for their current goal and not any factors which would alter it.

desc:
Post 168
*Causing electromotive forces to be generated by a change in the current flowing since 1935.*
